title: Bug 33046DBCS: Can type into readonly Text
description: RC1 Window  Preferences Workbench  Fonts page click in bottom "Description" Text area type typical english text: nothing is shown, good type a 2 or 4byte chinese character: it's shown, badI can't get a standalone example to do this, so perhaps this specific Text hassome obscure set of style bits that is allowing this to happen.
